tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Gastroscopy,Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) Treatment,Abdominal Pain Treatment,Health Checkup (General),Gastritis Treatment,
review: When I went there to consult him about a year back first time, I was suppose to wait for 2 patients ahead of me, I thought it’s fine, but it took sometime, but later I realised why it took that much time, though he is very young doctor, he listens very patiently and then he starts explaining the causes for the problem, and straight away he doesn’t advice any high tests, he suggests the most economical treatment as 1st, which he knows will cure the disease, but he puts in our mind what is the next step to be taken to rule out the disease completely, but I never went 2nd/3rd steps, but I had complete knowledge about my disease by then…my whole family treats him as a friend, even he follows up with us on what’s up about our health…one of a gem of a doctor I found in this so called ‘C’ field. 10/10 this is the only 4th doctor have that rating from me, stay blessed always doctor..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited doctor for stomach pain.
I’ve been seeing him for the last 2years. He listens to your problem carefully and explains the root cause very patiently. Most importantly he’s very friendly and doesn’t suggest lab tests unnecessarily. All the services are available at his clinic and are very much affordable. 
Sometimes I visit him even though it’s not his expertise as he refers to a good doctor and make sure I get the right treatment.
He is available on phone during emergency.
I strongly recommend Dr Rakesh for any medical issues. He’s the right person to see and above all he follow ups on your health which none of the doctor has done so far.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I use to feel lifeless, tired and exhausted all the time for last few months and did complete health check related tests done and visited many doctor but everyone said your hemoglobin is too low and does have few deficiencies, just follow good diet and exercises you will be alright but I had no energy even to walk so exercise was not even in question but I did follow healthy diet but couldn't see any results, hence after hours of search in practo I found this doctor and visited him. that was my best decision ever. doctor reviewed all my blood test reports thoroughly and suggested proper treatment and as my health conditions was bad, he suggested to get some priority treatment, which we followed and after a month, I am feeling so much better, I slowly got my energy back and feel that someone has returned my soul to my lifeless body. No body else could understand the root cause of my deteriorated health but he did and fixed it. Thank you so much doctor. You are a true Angel.

tags: None
review:
A new age Physician who understands new and old generation health issues very well and provides treatment accordingly.
Always there to help with utmost dedication and devotion.
Listens and understands very patiently. Does not prescribes or administers unnecessary tests or medicines resulting in less expenditure for patient, in addition to it, doesn't charges on many of the repetitive visits.
A very reliable, honest medical practitioner.
I consulted Dr Rakesh for Stomach issues for myself and few other issues for my Family.
Thank you Dr.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
**** **** ****** ** *********** ********** ** *** **** ****** *** ********** ** *********** **** ********** 

Dr Rakesh J P sir is having very good experience. We often visiting the clinic for master health checkup, diabetes, gastric and general health problems. He will explain the problem in detail and treatment is excellent.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Rakesh is very friendly and takes time to clearly explain the condition, medication, do's and dont's. 
He is always reachable and responds to any queries, even during the weekends and holidays. Further,  he often follows up with the patient to check how they are doing! I strongly recommend Dr. Rakesh for diabetes management and general consultation. 
Thank you very much doctor for your kind support and guidance!

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother was suffering from vomiting,  fever , tiredness,  I approached Dr.Rakesh J P . He noted down all points my mother was going through , he suggested and prescribed  treatment only after analyzing all problems my mother was going through.  My mother was hospitalized,  doctor replied to all my queries . Made me feel my mother was in safe hands. Doctor never suggested unnecessary tests or medicines.  I would strongly recommend Dr Rakesh J P to friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
********* ** ** ********* ******* Very humble and down to earth person. Addresses problem systematically. Doesn't go for an unnecessary test. Unlike other Doctors, he is not at all hungry to earn more.
Explains pros and cons of medicines. He will listen patiently to patients problem. He has excellent knowledge in Diabetes managment  , Gastro related problem and a general physician too. I would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
doctor is very calm. Noted down all of my issues and asked relavant quetions. Then explained me the reason for having fever and plan for treatment(Covid).  This gave me a lot of confidance.
Best part is the doctor mentioned the possible side effects and it prepared me mentally (generally i panick).

he even called next day to check on my health and i feel overwhelmed.

I strongly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
A very young and enthusiastic doctor that to being a physician is available very nearby on the main road of Nagarabhavi.
Very rarely we can find a doctor like this because after hearing/diagnosing the problems and sufferings of the patient, he won't proceed to prescribe the medicine (as most of the doctors normally does).
Instead he starts explaining the root cause of the disease with sketches/ diagrams to the patient and his attendants so that they understand better.  This act/method of explaining (dedicating his valuable time to each patient) of this doctor is very much appreciable.
Lastly but not the least, he always replies/clears all the doubts/queries of the patient over the phone with much patience and politeness. One can realize/understand his other good qualities ONLY after visiting him as the situation comes.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Outpatient treatment,Diabetes Treatment,Diabetes complications,Diabetic Neuropathy,Numbness and tingling,
review:
1. I took my mother of 78 years old. She was having foot burning issue since 4-5 years because of Diabetes.  Dr. Prescribed some medications and till few days still problem was there and in next visit he analyzed the problem again and prescribed another medicine. We were reluctant to take this medicine but he thoroughly explained benefits of this medicine and we realized this and after taking this medicine her foot burning issue is completely solved and she is very happy now.

2. When we informed Doctor about the above  he carefully duscussed the problem again and advised us to reduce or stop some medications which are not required and my mother was taking continuously as and when earlier Doctors prescribed.

As a whole he listens and explain the probable causes of the health issues so we have good faith in him.

tags: None
review:
Doctor is really focused in his work. He is really enthusiastic and moreover he has commitment in his work. Furthermore he is confident . To  be more precise, A patient seems to have a  doctor to be confident in what they are doing and whether the drug has been prescribed correctly. Above all he is 
empathetic.   I still remember, a patient  said  that they value a doctor who tries to understand what they are feeling and experiencing, physically and emotionally, and communicates and understands them. I remember when having rounds he cooperates with other members and try helping them out in their hard times. ******* ** ** * ********* ****** *** **** *** ********* ** **** *** ***** ******* *
